description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，曾任泽东青年干部学校生活指导处副处长，东北师范大学副校长、代校长，中国科学院吉林分院副院长。
description.en: Chinese educator. He served as the Deputy Director of the Life Guidance Department of the Zedong Youth Cadre School, the Vice President and Acting President of Northeast Normal University, and the Vice President of the Jilin Branch of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

en: Jilin Branch of the Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 丁浩川出生于直隶省完县（今河北省顺平县）。
description.en: Ding Haochuan was born in Wan County (now Shunping County, Hebei), Zhili Province.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Life Guidance Department

description.zh-cn: 丁浩川曾任泽东青年干部学校生活指导处副处长。
description.en: Ding Haochuan served as the Deputy Director of the Life Guidance Department of the Zedong Youth Cadre School.

description.zh-cn: 丁浩川曾任东北师范大学副校长、代校长。
description.en: Ding Haochuan served as the Vice President and Acting President of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 丁浩川曾任中国科学院吉林分院副院长。
description.en: Ding Haochuan served as the Vice President of the Jilin Branch of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，丁浩川是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Ding Haochuan was a member of the Communist Party of China.
